actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Resolution to require that the Congressional Record contain a verbatim account of remarks actually delivered on the floor.

summary.text: Requires the Congressional Record for the House of Representatives to contain an accurate and verbatim account of remarks actually delivered on the floor of the House together with supporting data. Limits revisions of verbatim remarks in the Record to the correction of grammatical and typographical errors which do not change the meaning, content, or substance of those remarks. Entitles Members to insert in the Records remarks not actually delivered on the floor. Stipulates that such insertions always be clearly distinguishable from verbatim remarks.

titles.title: Resolution to require that the Congressional Record contain a verbatim account of remarks actually delivered on the floor.
